vote.title: Re-Appointment of Quinten Harris, JD, MPA, of 111 N. Front Street, Columbus, OH 43215, to continue to serve on the RiverSouth Development Authority Board of Trustees as the local government representative, in his official capacity, for the current term expiring June 22, 2025, but shall continue to hold over into one or more subsequent terms until a new local government representative member is duly appointed or elected to serve for the remainder of such term. (résumé attached).
vote.description:
Title
 
Re-Appointment of Quinten Harris, JD, MPA, of 111 N. Front Street, Columbus, OH 43215, to continue to serve on the RiverSouth Development Authority Board of Trustees as the local government representative, in his official capacity, for the current term expiring June 22, 2025, but shall continue to hold over into one or more subsequent terms until a new local government representative member is duly appointed or elected to serve for the remainder of such term. (résumé attached).
